segments.text: Have you ever been to Britain ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh yes , I ’ Ve been to Britain many times . I go there on business .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? How often do you go there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Usually , I go to London twice a year but sometimes I go three or four times a year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you always go on business or do you sometimes go for a holiday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m afraid I never go for a holiday . It ’ s always business .
segments.speaker: S2
